divs: sighting detailssightings occurred over a two day period commencing sunday 1\27 to monday 1\28. my friend and i were traveling from springfield va to woodbridge, va. wenoticed what looked like a plane (or something) falling straight down like itwas going to crash. additionally, there were other fiery objects falling fromthe sky, but more in an arc position. we first thought this may be space junk,but simultaneously, we could see about 5 or 6 silvery roundish crafts very highin the sky (40k feet2b2b) at different places. they would appear and then disappear and appear again. we were first thinking it was space junk, until the falling, fiery thingsturned from going south and headed back in a northwest direction. i could onlyequate these things as having a fiery propulsion from them.my husbands coworkeradmitted to seeing the same things on sunday, but he thought it was space junk. he did not see the objects go north. however, i arrived home from work at 445pon monday (next day) and the same objects were out and about again, doing thesame things. i got a picture showing three of them. one object in particular,appears glinty and metallic in nature (when the pic is blown up). it was atthis time that i really saw the fire coming from the back of the objects as onecame much closer than the others i had previously seen. these objects werethere for quite some time. i lost sight of them on both occassions when theyjust disappeared.
